forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. West wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a substantial cloud cover, the sun attempting to peek through yet largely subdued. The chill remains in the air, with temperatures steadily curving downwards, inviting a sense of introspection typical of overcast days. Fog lingers cautiously along the bay, softening the outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge and shrouding the distant hills, while wreaths of mist hang low, a reminder of the marine layer’s gentle embrace. This atmospheric quilt creates a serene, if somewhat muted, canvas that might leave one longing for the vibrant colors of a clearer day.

As the afternoon approaches, the temperature will continue to mellow, settling around 51 degrees, urging a light jacket as the breeze whispers of the approaching evening chill. For those looking to savor the outdoors, a visit to a nearby café for a warm mug or taking a leisurely stroll along the waterfront may be ideal, allowing one to bask in the serene beauty of a city cloaked in haze. Offsetting warmth through layers can only enhance your comfort as the clouds promise a night that settles softly around 45 degrees. It’s a day for quiet appreciation, a gentle reminder to seek solace in the simple, understated beauty of the city’s close embrace with the sea.
